divs: sighting detailsi felt drawn outside around 4 pm on 2\28\08 thursday. i was looking at a few jets spewing out chemtrails when i noticed a silvery football shaped orb (w\no exhaust nor features). it was a very clear, blue bird sky with the exception of the chemtrails. i yelled for my girlfriend to come outside and she spotted it also. we both agreed it looked more like an oval, football shape with a silvery luminosity that stood out in contrast compared to the chemtrails jets that were close to it. at one point in the beginning, i thought the object was going to crash into or nearly miss a chemtrail jets as they approached each other from opposite directions. i caught one good photo with my digital binoculars as it faded into the distance. by the way, i've come to relize that i've had contact all my life. my girlfriend has had quite a few sightings w\me and is now is convinced believer. she has had a dream (last feb-jan)where by a craft hovers over her mothers' house as it drops geometric lights over the house and yard. similar to the levittown incidet. she said it was a very vivid dream. i have photographed other craft\light forms near my home. thanks for hearing me out, joe
trends: there have been no other sightings in cms\tg n\a
This sighting has never been favorited.
